name: Zoe Kabloe and the Quest for Brunch
name_original: Zoe Kabloe and the Quest for Brunch
description:
Zoë Kabloë was on her way to meet her trans slime friends for brunch in the Village, when suddenly, the filthy rich SLIME LORD cranked up rent prices and bulldozed everything for the opulent CONDO CASTLE.

Worse, in an effort to "clean up the neighbourhood" there are police slimes everywhere, and Zoë's friends have all been sent to slime jail!

With her trusty baseball bat in tow, she sets out to save her friends, evict the Slime Lord, and have brunch!

This game was made for the Queerly Representing the Underrepresented Game Jam.

Controls:

Movement: Arrow keys

Jump: X, Swing Bat: Z

Quit: Hold Escape

System requirements:

Should run in any browser that supports WebGL 2.0. Downloadable versions are also provided. Note that, as of uploading, only the WebGL and OS X version have been properly tested.

Credits:

Lauren H - programming, art - laurheth.itch.io

Signs - sound, music - signs.itch.io
